# Config file.
# Lines starting with # are comments and are ignored.
#This file contains a list of all the spawnable creatures in the game.
#
# The format is:
# "<Spawn code>" <Name> <Length> <Width>
# 001010                // Array of inputs for the creature
# 110100                // Length = 6, Width = 3
# 110001                // 1 = alive, 0 = dead
#
# Check example below for more details.

g Glider 3 3
001
101
011

b Blinker 3 1
111

e Exploder 5 5
00000
01010
01110
01010
00000

ggg Gosper-Glider-Gun 36 9

000000000000000000000010100000000000
000000000000110000001100000000000011
000000000001000100001100000000000011
110000000010000010001100000000000000
110000000010001011000010100000000000
000000000010000010000000100000000000
000000000001000100000000000000000000
000000000000110000000000000000000000
